text: Noel Murphy (born 1931) was an Irish hurler who played for Tipperary Senior Championship club Thurles Sarsfields. He played for the Tipperary senior hurling team for a number of seasons, during which time he usually lined out as a wing-back. ==Honours== ;Tipperary *All-Ireland Senior Hurling Championship (2): 1958, 1962 *Munster Senior Hurling Championship (3): 1958, 1960, 1962 ==References== Category:1936 births Category:1997 deaths Category:Thurles Sarsfields hurlers Category:Tipperary inter-county hurlers
title: Noel Murphy (hurler)
